title: Gwen
content:
Gwen is an NPC located in the Gwen's Lumber in Hopeforest who sells and buys logs and branches gathered from the woodcutter profession and used in the carpenter profession.

Purchasing Rugged Pine Logs or Rugged Oak Logs and taking them directly to the circular saw is a popular method of training carpentry to level 32 for the Spider's Nest quest.
